page.title: 02POPULATION OF UCKFIELD 1.
page.content: Much of the housing in Uckfield is modern,built in the last 20years.There are 3 private housing estates,{Manor {Park,Rocks Park and Ridgewood. We live on Manor Park. It was completed about twenty years ago and was built on the grounds of a large manor house formerly occupied by Lord Nevill who was a friend of Queen Elizabeth.The Queen sometimes visited the house.Some of the roads help us to remember this situation,for example Nevill Road and Queen's Approach. Forty questionnaires were sent to our parents;twenty to mothers and twenty to fathers,none of them being in the same family.These questionnaires sought the origins of our parents and the reasons for them coming to Uckfield.They also asked whether our parents were content here and any reasons for discontent.
